topic.title: Loan Portal – Release Notes v2.3
topic.shortdesc: Summary of new features, improvements, and bug fixes in Qbank’s Loan Portal version 2.3.

ul.li: Document Upload Preview: Users can preview uploaded documents before submission.
Loan Status Tracker: Visual progress bar shows application stages.
Push Notifications: Real-time alerts for status changes and missing documents.
Enhanced error messaging for failed uploads
Fixed incorrect status display for rejected applications
Addressed timeout errors during peak hours
